fmod.message.monsterattack: %1$s may be surrounded by %3$s monsters such as %2$s.
fmod.message.entitywarning: There are %s entities being loaded in the world now.
fmod.command.version.error: An unexpected error occurred while showing the version information.
fmod.command.dev.end: Finish executing the dev function, the return value is %s
fmod.command.dev.error: Cannot print the stacktrace of the dev function.
fmod.command.gpt.spam: Please wait until you receive the response before sending another request.

fmod.command.gpt.unknownerror: An unexpected error occurred while serializing the request object.

fmod.command.share.dimdistance: %s told you that he is currently in a different dimension.

fmod.command.share.error: An error occurred while sharing your information.
fmod.command.share.playeronly: This command must be executed by a player.

fmod.command.song.eofexception: The file %s is not a valid song file.
fmod.command.song.cancel: The song %2$s has been cancelled for %1$s.
fmod.command.song.finish: The song %2$s has been finished for %1$s.
fmod.command.song.long: The song %s is only %ss long, so cannot play the song at %ss.
fmod.command.song.speed: Set the speed of %2$s for %1$s to %3$s.

fmod.command.options.entdeathmsg: Set Show Entity Death Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.gptkey: Set GPT API Access Tokens to %s
fmod.command.options.bcbossdeath: Set Show Boss Death Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.nameddeath: Set Show Named Entity Death Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.bossmaxhp: Set Boss Max Health Threshold to %s
fmod.command.options.bckillerdeath: Set Show Killer Death Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.bcdeathcoord: Set Show Player Death Coordinates to %s
fmod.command.options.projbeinghit: Set Show Projectile Being Hit Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.projhitting: Set Show Projectile Hitting Entity Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.informafkthres: Set Inform AFK Time Threshold to %ss
fmod.command.options.bcafkthres: Set Broadcast AFK Time Threshold to %ss
fmod.command.options.stopafk: Set Broadcast Back from AFK to %s
fmod.command.options.changebiome: Set Show Change Biome Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.biomedelay: Set Change Biome Message Delay to %ss
fmod.command.options.bossfightinterval: Set Boss Fight Messages Interval to %ss
fmod.command.options.monsterloc: Set Surrounded by Monster Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.monsterreceiver: Set Surrounded by Monster Messages to %s
fmod.command.options.monsterinterval: Set Surrounded by Monster Messages Interval to %ss
fmod.command.options.entityinterval: Set Entity Number Check Interval to %stick
fmod.command.unknownerror: An unexpected error occurred while executing the command.
fmod.options.title: F Minecraft Mod Options
fmod.options.tip: You can also use command /f options to change these options.
fmod.options.hint.translate:
If enabled, the server will translate all the messages before sending them to the client.
This is useful if only the server has this mod installed and the client does not have it.
But if enabled, the message will not follow the client's language setting.
§cThis option will not working on the client side.
§rDefault: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.entdeathmsg:
When an entity dies, the position of the death meesage to be shown.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.gpturl:
The URL of the target GPT server when executing command /f gpt.
This mod will use the OpenAI API. So if you want to deploy a local large language model, you must make sure it is compatible with the OpenAI API.
Default: §3"http://127.0.0.1:12345/v1/chat/completions"
fmod.options.hint.gptkey:
The access tokens of the GPT server.
If the sever does not need an access token, leave it blank.
Default: §3""
fmod.options.gptkey.noedit: §cFor security reasons, you cannot edit the access tokens here. If you need to modify it, please use the command /f options gptAccessTokens.
fmod.options.hint.gptmodel:
The model to use when executing command /f gpt.
If the sever does not need to choose a model, leave it blank.
Default: §3""
fmod.options.hint.gptsysprompt:
The system prompts of GPT, at the beginning of all the conversations.
Default: §3""
fmod.options.hint.gpttemperature:
The temperature parameter of GPT.
Default: §d0.8
fmod.options.hint.gpttimeout:
The timeout when getting response from the GPT server.
A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.
Unit: seconds
Default: §d60
fmod.options.hint.bcbossdeath:
When a boss dies, the position of the death meesage to be shown.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.nameddeath:
When a entity with custom name dies, the position of the death meesage to be shown.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.bossmaxhp:
If an entity's max health is greater than this value, it will be recognized as a boss.
Default: §d150
fmod.options.hint.bckillerdeath:
When a killer dies, the position of the death meesage to be shown.
If an entity has killed a player before, it will be recognized as a killer.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.bcdeathcoord:
Who will receive the chat message contains the coordinate of the death location when a player dies.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.projbeinghit:
Who will receive the actionbar message when a projectile hits a player.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.projhitting:
Who will receive the actionbar message when a projectile thrown by a player hits an entity.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.informafk:
Who will always show the actionbar message when a player is suspected to be afking until he is back.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.informafkthres:
If a player did not change his sight direction after this time, he will be suspected to be afking.
Unit: seconds
Default: §d60
fmod.options.hint.bcafk:
Who will receive a chat message when a player is confirmed afking.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.bcafkthres:
If a player did not change his sight direction after this time, he will be confirmed afking.
Unit: seconds
Default: §d300
fmod.options.hint.stopafk:
Who will receive a chat message when a player is back from afking.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.changebiome:
Who will receive an actionbar message when a player enters a new biome.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.biomedelay:
How long after a player enters a new biome before showing the change biome message.
This is designed to avoid a player frequently cross the boundary of two biomes to spam actionbar messages.
Default: §d10
fmod.options.hint.bossfightloc:
The position of the message to be shown when a player attacks a boss.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.bossfightreceiver:
Who will receive the message when a player attacks a boss.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.bossfightinterval:
After how long showing the last boss fight message before showing the next one.
If you have already set the boss fight message to chat, please increase this value to avoid spamming messages.
Unit: seconds
Default: §d60
fmod.options.hint.monsterloc:
The position of the message to be shown when a player is surrounded by monsters.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.monsterreceiver:
Who will receive the message when a player is surrounded by monsters.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.monsterinterval:
After how long showing the last surrounded by monster message before showing the next one.
If you have already set the surrounded by monster message to chat, please increase this value to avoid spamming messages.
Unit: seconds
Default: §d60
fmod.options.hint.monsternumber:
If the number of monsters near a player is greater than this value, that player will be recognized as surrounded by monsters.
Default: §d8
fmod.options.hint.monsterdistance:
If the Chebyshev distance between a player and a monster is less than this value, that monster will be recognized as near the player.
Unit: meters
Default: §d12
fmod.options.hint.entitywarning:
When the number of entities in the world is greater than the threshold, the position of the warning message to be shown.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.entitynumber:
If the number of entities in the world is greater than this value, the warning message will be shown.
This is designed to inform players to avoid too many entities lagging the server.
Default: §d3000
fmod.options.hint.entityinterval:
How often to check the number of entities in the world.
Frequently checking the number of the entities may cause lag.
Unit: ticks
Default: §d20
fmod.options.hint.playerhurt:
Who will receive the actionbar message when a player is seriously hurt.
Default: §cOFF
fmod.options.hint.damagethres:
If the damage dealt to a player is greater than this percentage of his max health, that player will be recognized as seriously hurt.
Default: §d80%
